member.summary: Clears relevant objects from memory.

member.summary: Empties the statistical sample.

member.summary: Updates fields with the appropriate values, selects the entry textbox.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.SixSCalculator.tryValueAdd(System.String)
member.summary: Validation code for the user's entry.
member.param: Value entered by the user for addition to the statistical sample.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.SixSCalculator.validateMeanOrSigma(System.Windows.Forms.TextBox,System.String)
member.summary: Given the user's entry for the process target or process tolerance, validates the entry.
member.param: Text box that contians the value.
Default string representation of the value.
member.returns: The contents of the textbox if the user's entry is valid, the default value if not.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.SixSCalculator.btnUpdateValues_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Attempts to add the value in the entry field to the statistical sample.

member.summary: Handles the enter key; allows the user to pass values to the statistical sample by pressing enter.

member.summary: If a value has been selected from the drop down list, the selected value is removed from the statistical sample.

member.summary: Performs validation on the Target Mean field.

member.name: P:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.SampleSize
member.summary: Returns the number of elements in the current sample.
member.value: This is the number of elements that have been added to the statistical sample in a string that's safe to display in a text box.
member.returns: Number of elements in the current sample.

member.name: P:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.SixSigma
member.summary: Returns the current six sigma span (twelve standard deviations) if applicable.

member.name: P:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.StringSixSigma
member.summary: Returns the six sigma range (12 standard deviations,) across n-1, in a string that may be displayed in a text box.
member.value: This returns the six sigma range (12 standard deviations,) across n-1, in a string that may be displayed in a text box.
member.returns: Six sigma range, or "N/A" if no such range exists.

member.name: P:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.Mean
member.summary: Returns the mean of the sample as a double (returns 0 if the sample is empty.)
member.value: Average of the sample if applicable.

member.name: P:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.StringMean
member.summary: Returns the sample mean as a string that may be displayed in a text box
member.value: Returns the sample mean as a string that may be displayed in a text box.
member.returns: The sample mean, or N/A if no mean has been defined.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.AddValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the statistical sample with the given data point.
member.param: Value added to the statistical sample.
member.remarks: Consuming code is responsible for error handling and validation.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.smartFormat(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts numeric entry into usable string, formatted for significant figures.
member.returns: Number converted to string and formatted.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.Clear
member.summary: Empties StatSample- sets sample size, mean, and six sigma to null default values.

member.name: M:SixSigmaApp.StatSample.RemoveValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Removes a value from the statistical sample.

member.summary: Sets members in the object when the sample has been updated.
